nodes.text: Ikon was a red dwarf star in the Ikon system of the Majoor sector, located within the Trailing Sectors portion of the Expansion Region. It was orbited by an asteroid belt, where Rebel Alliance sympathizers had gained a foothold under the nose of the Galactic Empire in the aftermath of the Battle of Yavin.

Ikon appeared in the first issue of the Star Wars: River of Chaos comic-book series, which was written by Louise Simonson and illustrated by June Brigman. Issue 1 was published by Dark Horse Comics on June 6, 1995.
The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Ikon system, and therefore the star Ikon, in grid square N-15.
